Title: Cross-site Scripting
Description: Cross-Site Scripting in link validator component.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.18, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.3
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.18 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.3
